item.title: Spring 2023 Harvard Map Collection
item.description: Collections and support services Historic maps of Havana in the Harvard Map Collection Land cover map of Louisiana from 1909 in the Harvard Map Collection. The legend of the 1909 land cover map of Louisiana. USGS data download tool, showing land cover data from 2016. Global volcanoes dataset in the Harvard Geospatial Library (HGL). Workshops Mapping Inequality project via the University of Richmond’s Digital Scholarship Lab. Land-Grab Univerisities interactive digital project.
